summary: Harry Musk is one in a million. Adult, pint-sized Harry longs to be part of the big world.
cast: Paul Dale|Lorraine Miller|Will Geer|Nina Koshetz|Steve Brodie|Anne Sholter|Todd Karns|Margaret Field|Shirley Mills|Thomas Browne Henry|Harry Harvey|Paul E. Burns|Jacqui Snyder|Lora Lee Michel|Florence Auer|Tony Barr|William Castle|Stephen Chase|Jack Chefe|Henry Corden|Rory Mallinson|Fred Sherman
title: It's a Small World
